@description.name: @description
@description.body: A wrapper for Cookie handling. Previous versions of qooxoo use escape() and unescape() functions. Since those functions are deprecated, then now qooxdoo use encodeURIComponent() and decodeURIComponent() functions. This may break some cookies. There are no issues with special characters like ~!@#$%^&*(){}[]=:/,;?+\'"\\ but some unicode characters like äëíöü (etc) are encoded different by escape() and encodeURIComponent(), so you must take care of this change if you use unicode characters.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the string value of a cookie.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: key {String} The key for the saved string value.
@param.description: The key for the saved string value.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {null | String} Returns the saved string value, if the cookie contains a value for the key, null otherwise.
@return.description: Returns the saved string value, if the cookie contains a value for the key, null otherwise.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the string value of a cookie.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: key {String} The key for the string value.
@param.description: The key for the string value.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: expires {Number?null} The expires in days starting from now, or null if the cookie should deleted after browser close.
@param.description: The expires in days starting from now, or null if the cookie should deleted after browser close.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Deletes the string value of a cookie.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: key {String} The key for the string value.
@param.description: The key for the string value.
